overview: After the success of the first part, "Hotboy rebels and the story of Laugher, prostitute and duck", part 2 reveals more details about the complex and paradoxical male prostitution world. After being rescued, Lam returned to his old job: "find a way to find customers" and still went on to find Khoi, his ex-boyfriend. When Lam met Khoi, Lam realized his fate was too unfair for him. Could Lam do it all over again to have a new life?
title: Lost in Paradise 2
